title: Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (March 3, 2017)
description: Explore the vast kingdom of Hyrule as Link in this critically acclaimed open-world adventure.

title: God of War: Ragnarok (November 9, 2022)
description: Kratos and Atreus journey across mythological realms to prevent the end of the world.

title: Red Dead Redemption (May 18, 2010)
description: Live the life of an outlaw in the dying days of the American Old West in this open-world epic.

title: Pokemon Crystal Version (December 14, 2000)
description: Catch and train Pokemon in this enhanced version of the popular second-generation Pokemon games.

title: Final Fantasy 9 (July 7, 2000)
description: Join Zidane and his allies on a magical journey to save their world from destruction.

title: Legend of Mana (July 15, 1999)
description: Shape the world of Fa'Diel through magical artifacts and explore its hidden mysteries in this action RPG.

title: Legend of Legaia (October 29, 1998)
description: A young warrior must awaken ancient Seru creatures to battle a deadly mist in this unique RPG.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (October 25, 2019)
description: The stakes are higher than ever as you fight in intense, realistic military missions in this modern-era FPS.

title: Super Mario Brothers (September 13, 1985)
description: Join Mario as he embarks on a classic adventure to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches.

title: Brave Story: New Traveler (July 31, 2007)
description: Embark on an epic journey to alter fate and save a loved one in this beautifully crafted RPG.

title: Pac-Man (May 22, 1980)
description: Gobble up pellets and outwit ghosts in this iconic maze-chase game that defined a generation.

title: Resident Evil 3 Remake (April 3, 2020)
description: Jill Valentine fights to survive Raccoon City's zombie outbreak while being hunted by the relentless Nemesis.
